name: Marvin's Message
description:
Follow Marvin on his journey to deliver his message as he slowly powers down. You as the player will also lose power as your controls become more and more limited as systems progressively shut down. Find new ways to beat levels and solve puzzles as Marvin's functions change.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Restart Level: R
  • Drill: Space
